snippet: The police said that Tio Hardiman, head of a violence prevention group that works with Chicago gang members, was arrested Friday after his wife came to the police station with injuries.
abstract: Chicago police say Tio Hardiman, head of anti-violence organization, was arrested after his wife came to police station with injuries; he faces a misdemeanor domestic battery charge.
lead_paragraph: The police said that Tio Hardiman, head of a violence prevention group that works with Chicago gang members, was arrested Friday after his wife came to the police station with injuries.
